name: Lifeline Loot
description:
Money can't buy happiness, or so they say, but this time it can buy you time.

WELCOME TO LIFELINE LOOT

Flooded with debt the only thing to keep you alive is nothing else than money. Avoid debt collectors while moving around town and survive for as long as you can, for in this world without money you are nothing but a dead body.

Also compatible with controllers, you just need to figure out which button can be used to jump, for example on the PS4's DS4 is the square button.

Didn't have lots of time this jam but at least I manage to put something together. Please give a try and comment :)
